yodha ala bamma matha natharawu athtraktaraye giyaraya lihilwa passata awith pol gasatath handalayatath samiya hirawuna - birinda thilaksiri mekhala sakshi demin kiyayi athtraktar anathurakin siduwu sanjiwa namathi dedaru piyage maranaya anuradhapura wishesha - parsi kuruneru yodha ala bamma matha nathara wu athtraktaraye "giyaraya niwtal" wi pasuwa eya aapassata adi gos riyaduru asune wadiwi eya padawagena giya samiyage pitakonda thama niwasa pihiti midule athi pol gase heththuwimath samagama ath traktaraye hadalaye bareka ohuge papuwata thadawi thibuna yayi ikuth 24 wanida shrawasthipura yodha ala para pradeshayedi ath traktarayak padawagena yamin sitiyadi siduwu maraka anathurakin miyagiya shrawasthipura yodha ala pare pa nchiwa siti dedaru piyaku wu kasthuriaarachchilage sanjiwa kularathna mahathage ha si maranaya sambandhayen pawathi ha si marana parikshanayedi miyagiya ayage birinda wana ke. ee. thilaksiri mekhala (26) mahathmiya sakshi demin ese kiwaya.
